transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Lakshmi electrical se bol raha hu.
Customer: Kon sa? Lakshmi electrical.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Ji namaskar namaskar sir Prabhat baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji. Awaaz aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Haan aa rahi hai aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ji ji sir maine aapko na number diya tha sir aapne fir uske baad customer care mein baar baar call kar rahe hain sir aise to fir aapka fir
Executive: Ke baad aapko number jaise hi aapne call kiya aap call kar rahe hain.
Customer: Aap kaun bol rahe hain?
Executive: Sir Prabhat baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Nahi Prabhat aapne abhi thodi der pehle baat hui thi Pranshu se hui thi.
Executive: Haan to sir Pranshu se thi kal maine aapko bola tha na Pranshu L1 hai main senior manager hu kal aapne pura scenario mujhe bataya tha maine bola tha aapko puch ke bataunga sara.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm. Sir aap dekhiye aise baar baar call karne se sir [inaudible] meri baat suno wo kuch jaan bujh ke nahi kiya gaya tha maine save hi wo IndiaMART ke naam se kar rakha hai to wo maine kar diya usse lag gaya baad mein pata laga call yahan le aao mil gaya to mil gaya usse kuch kar nahi sakte hain fir wo maine hata kar ke fir wo particular naam se save kara. Maine ye wo bhi ye baat aap bol rahe hain ye baat unhone bhi boli thi.
Customer: [inaudible] usse mat karo maine wo to mere ko pata hai wo baar baar aapka koi [inaudible]
Executive: Nahi sir usse kya matlab hai [inaudible] complaint bhi karta hai aur complaint mein fir wo fir aur escalate karta hai fir yahan par refund ki to policy nahi hoti fir kahin se refund bhi nahi ho paata. Kyunki dekhiye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Nahi wo maine hata diya uske dobara call nahi jayegi.
Customer: Wo number wo save kar rakha hai [inaudible] usko hata hi diya maine.
Executive: Aap aise sochiye.
Executive: Aapko kisi ne koi miscommitment nahi ki na fraud ki yahan par kahin na kahin galti aapki end se ye hai ki aap aap ekdam se use karke bol rahe hain ki mera ye problem hai main use nahi karna chahta hu. IndiaMART ki taraf se ye dikkat hoti ki kisi ne aapko miscommitment kiya hota ya koi likh ke diya hota ya fir hum hamare product mein galat sale kar diya hota ya is product mein to business hi nahi hai humne de diya. But aisa koi scenario nikal hi nahi pa raha hai.
Customer: Sir meri baat suniye aap jyada usme deeply ja rahe hain jo hua hai wo aisa nahi hua hai ki matlab jaan bujh ke maine milaya ho. Main bata raha hu na ki wo save tha mere IndiaMART ke naam se maine isliye usko direct mila diya.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap call kitne baar bhi kijiye usse koi dikkat nahi hai sir call aapka hak hai aap kar sakte hain.
Executive: But main keh raha hu maine aapko aap aapko solution na milega aap din bhar mein 100 phone kijiye usse kya le jaao usse to dekhiye jo solution milna hai wahi milega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: But mera ye kehna hai ki jab maine aapko time diya hai ek do din ka time dijiye jo bhi hoga discuss karke bata denge maine aapko mana bhi to kiya nahi ki nahi milega ya haan hoga. Maine bola ki sir discuss karta hu baat karta hu jo management bolegi wo aapke paas maan lijiye wo theek hai call nahi aayega mere aur Pranshu ka bhi phone bhi aaya tha maine kaha Pranshu ye mera number bhi aapke paas tha mujhe bhi call kar lijiye aap direct phone kijiye aap uske baad hum aapko maximum Monday tak aapko final solution mil jayega. Puri koshish kar rahe hain ki aapke favor mein hi solution ho nahi hoga to bhi bata denge kyunki aapka dekho aaj bhi jo deal aayi hai HR consultancy ki deal kaafi aa rahi hai aapko.
Customer: Nahi wo uss cheez se sambandhit nahi hai nahi.
Customer: Hmm. Jo mera hai na wo usse match nahi khata ye kuch aur cheez hai. Uss mein kai sare alag alag cheeze hoti hain to wo usse juda hua hai jo hum dekh rahe hain wo cheez nahi hai iske andar.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Koi nahi ab nahi aayega maine bataya na aapko wo uske baad maine dial karne ke baad socha maine kaha yaar ye kahin aisa na hoga wo aadmi phone karne lago ki mana kiya tha fir bhi maine dial kar diya wo dial ho chuka udhar uth gaya fir mere ko laga yaar ye to galti ho gayi chalo.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: [inaudible] number to simple hai yaad hone wali cheez hai.
Customer: Haan ki sir ye number hai jo bhi aap clear mujhe bataiye ki sir kya raha nahi raha.
Executive: Kyunki dekhiye aap abhi aapko filhaal mein use nahi kar rahe jo bhi hum best to best solution aapko de denge theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Yes sir solution mein band karwa raha hu sir sir yes par feedback de dijiyega aur Monday tak koshish karte hain ki aapke favor mein solution aaye nahi hoga to dobara aapko jo bhi lagta hai aapko jaise wo kar sakte hain aap theek hai.
Executive: Koshish puri hai sir ki aapke favor mein hum [inaudible]
Customer: Wo kaam karna wo ho jaaye hame kya matlab hai kisi ko usse.
Executive: Haan sir wahi to hum bhi koshish kar rahe hain ki aapka kaam bhi karwa de ki aapko jyada aage karke problem na ho. Hum bhi to ye chahenge fir baar baar baar baar takleef mein pareshan na ho.
Executive: But sir har cheez apne haath mein nahi hoti hai na sir. Koshish hum bhi kar sakte hain but iske liye pura management mein approval ke liye gaya hai sara scenario bana ke bhej diya hai aur ekdam se maine kal hi bheja to ek do din to lagega na kam se kam lagane mein.
Customer: Nahi last time nahi hamari shayad do teen din pehle baat hui thi to aapne na shayad aaj update karne ke liye bola tha. To uss hisab se maine phone milaya aur phone mil gaya tha.
Executive: Monday ko tak aapko time do Monday tak ka time do Monday tak ko final mil jayega ho sakta hai agar kal tak to maine Pranshu ko bola tha main Monday ko hi call karunga ab.
Executive: Monday ko customer care mein direct mujhe call karna ek baar. Haan ji main customer care mein jaunga. Hota kya hai customer care mein ek to aapke complaint aane lag jaate hain aap karoge to tab iske sath sath hamare complaint aati hai badhti wo ek pura lamba chauda wo ho jaata hai aapko dikat hoti hai aur complaint bhi aati hai maan lo wo likhenge wo subah aap daloge shaam ko complaint banti hai to hame call karne mein bhi time lag jaata hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm theek hai.
Executive: Koi nahi aap usko band karwa dijiye complaint.
Executive: Theek hai sir yes par kar dena band karwa dena Monday tak aapko solution karwa denge theek hai jo bhi hai. Theek hai theek hai theek hai. Theek hai sir fir feedback par aayega sir usse yes par click kar dena theek hai thank you. Theek hai ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received calls after requesting closure.

- Customer wants a refund.

- Customer says the leads are not relevant.



Resolution:

- Executive assured no further calls after removal.

- Executive explained the refund policy.

- Executive assured to resolve issue by Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback on the call.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, customer care
